title: Beauty: A story about how love transforms how we see the world.
description: Little Cuddly Koala and Big Snuggly Koala set out to discover the secret of beauty. A story about how love transforms how we see the world.If you enjoyed Ursula le Guin, Guess How Much I Love You, by Sam McBratney or Tiny Star, by Mem Fox you will enjoy this read about how beautiful we find the people who are closest to us.
author: Shea Cullen
